name: Pica
description:
Pica was inspired by geometry wars, but implemented with a different control style.

Use the mouse to move the player ship, use WASD or Arrow keys to move the cross hairs. Hold click to shoot. New enemies appear the further you make it.

Built in Javascript/HTML5.

Click the play link in the top left hand corner to start, refresh the page to start the game over (sorry!).
